remarks: Define a relation which corresponds to proper subsethood ~ df-pss on sets.  This allows us to use proper subsethood with general concepts that require relations, such as strict ordering, see ~ sorpss . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Nov-2014.)
statement:
df-rpss $p |- [C.] = { <. x , y >. | x C. y } $.
$d x y $.
